page.title: 02ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Apart from an occasional dance in a local hotel what little entertainment there is, is provided by amateurs who work for charities. People have to travel to Edinburgh for cinemas, concerts, theatres etc. The WHIPMAN PLAY is a folk festival held in June. This caters for adults and children. It consists of competitions,fancy dress parades, pipe bands and dances etc. A dance is held and two plays are produced by the amateur dramatic group each year. The P.T.A. organise two dances, a whist drive and other events each year to raise money for school funds. Home entertainment depends on television, radio, records, computer games and videos. Our survey found that computer games and films on videos to be the most popular.
